metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11764 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Mozilla developers and community members reported memory safety bugspresent in Firefox 69 and Firefox ESR 68.1. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 70, Thunderbird < 68.2, and Firefox ESR < 68.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
